name: Saber
tagline: Build static sites in Vue.js, without the hassle

fields.name: Zero Setup
fields.value: Automatic code splitting, file-system based routing, hot code reloading and built-in Markdown support.

fields.name: Bring Your Own Data
fields.value: Build sites with the data you want: Pull data from headless CMS, SaaS services, APIs, your file-system, and more.

fields.name: Fully Extensible
fields.value: With Saber's powerful APIs and plugin system, you can customize almost everything.
